Chapter 7 

     17 (Genesis 14:18-20; Psalm 110:4). A High Priest After the Order of Melchisedec.--The high priest was designed in an especial manner to represent Christ, who was to become a high priest forever after the order of Melchisedec. This order of priesthood was not to pass to another, or be superseded by another (Redemption: The First Advent of Christ, p. 14).
